void destroy( pointer p );

{{dcl|num=2|since=c++11|deprecated=c++17|removed=c++20|

void destroy( U* p );

Calls the destructor of the object pointed to by {{c|p}}.

@1@ Calls {{c|p-&gt;~T()}}.
@2@ Calls {{c|p-&gt;~U()}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|p|pointer to the object that is going to be destroyed}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
